2aii: We Think Agility, Transparency, and Excellence.
2aiii: TexKoop provides customizable on-demand delivery and errand services through our digital platform that is designed to support users' need for ease and transparency.
card_a_head: Deliver Your Fashion Apparels and Accessories
card_b_head: Get Help for Your Last-Minute Errands.
card_c_head: Electronics Are Handled and Delivered With Care..

card_a_text: We deliver fashion apparels and accessories, from your favourite stores. Easily find riders to make your deliveries swift and seamless.
card_b_text: Do you need to get that urgent item from home or anywhere else? Find riders on our platform to complete your errands.
card_c_text: We deliver electronics and gadgets to your doorstep or your clientsâ€™ on time and without dings or dents.
card_d_text: Our safety guidelines help to ensure that delicate shipments like pharmaceuticals arrive safely and on time.
card2_a_text: We provide Gigs for individuals who want to earn extra income. Sign up with us today and start earning.
card2_b_text: With our user-friendly product, all you need to do is book our service with one click and we will handle the rest.
card2_c_text: We utilise an efficient route plan to help our riders  discover the fastest and safest routes to use when delivering your goods.
card2_d_text: We have adopted eco-friendly processes and the  to ensure the maintenance of a sustainable environment.
card2_e_text: We ensure to deliver on our brand promise, which is to make the lives of every customer easier by being responsive to their needs.
card2_f_text: We deploy data to improve our performance and identify areas of strength, weaknesses, opportunities and market trends.
card2_g_text: We use AI and IoT driven technology to track items and drivers. This ensures fast delivery of parcels in an efficient way.
card2_h_text: We understand the value of  updates. No need to fret! Turn on your notification and we will notify you every step of the way.
location_text: Here is your chance to tell us about your city and we will be there soon.
local_businesses: We have fostered solid partnerships with local businesses.
